_header: In my heart is there nothing of remembrance
_description: To his Sovereign Lady — three stanzas rhyme royal

BodRawPoe36.First Lines:
In my hertt is þer nothyng off remembraunsthat to Ioy sownyth
                    saue only to thyng vp on yow…
BodRawPoe36.Last Lines:
…ye take in gre how þat my wrytyng be rudeTo trowth yt
                    sownyth and so y conclude
BodRawPoe36.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope,
                        ed.  
             Secular Lyrics of the XIV and XV Centuries.
         2nd ed. Oxford: Clarendon, 1955: 193-4.
